name: Renewable energy app Wind&Sun
description:
Hi everyone,

Sharing some screens of Wind&Sun renewable energy application. The app is designed to provide information to the consumer in a clear and convenient way, to give them more power and freedom in purchasing, operating and selling the generated energy as an investment unit. It also provides access to renewable energy for a broader range of people, thus taking care of their future, reducing their electricity bills and contributing to solving environmental problems.
